intro: Podospermum junceum, commonly known as the slender podospermum, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, herbaceous stems and small, opposite leaves. It produces clusters of tiny, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in spring. The fruit is a capsule that splits open to release small, wind-dispersed seeds.
